name: Youtube - Hide Comments (and reveal on hover)
description:
Hides comments on page load and, after a one-second delay, fades them in on hover. 
Perfect for avoiding spoilers!

Compatible with the new YouTube design, as of 17/12.

Works awesomely with style 58088.
additional_info:
18/12 - Now displays "Showing comments..." before comments are faded in so you know the style's doing its thing.
17/12 - Initial release.
